title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Simple yet incredibly delicious.
description: Authentic Roman spaghetti carbonara made the traditional way with guanciale, pecorino cheese, eggs, and black pepper. This recipe stays true to its roots for an unforgettable pasta experience.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth, buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy. A British-Indian fusion favorite.
description: Creamy, rich, and flavorful chicken tikka masala with tender pieces of marinated chicken in a spiced tomato and cream sauce. Perfect served with naan or rice.

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce in a toasted bun.
description: The ultimate homemade burger with a perfectly seasoned beef patty, melted cheese, and all the classic toppings. Grill or pan-fry to juicy perfection.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful mix of fresh vegetables quickly cooked in a savory soy-ginger sauce. Healthy and delicious!
description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir-fry packed with colorful veggies in a savory ginger-garlic sauce. Ready in under 30 minutes and completely customizable.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, perfect for special occasions.
description: Indulgent chocolate lava cakes with a warm, gooey center. Impressive yet surprisingly easy to make. Perfect for date nights or dinner parties.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh Mediterranean salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil dressing.
description: Authentic Greek salad with fresh vegetables, Kalamata olives, and creamy feta cheese dressed in extra virgin olive oil and oregano. Simple and refreshing.
